title: Initiative
extract: In political science, an initiative is a means by which a petition signed by a certain minimum number of registered voters can force a public vote, in parliament or via a referendum, the latter then being dubbed a Popular initiated Referendum.
extract_html: In political science, an initiative is a means by which a petition signed by a certain minimum number of registered voters can force a public vote, in parliament or via a referendum, the latter then being dubbed a Popular initiated Referendum.
